description: Try our easy to follow Gnocchi & Sausage Bolognese recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Gnocchi & Sausage Bolognese Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, bring a saucepan to the boil. Add gnocchi and cook as per packet instructions. Drain. Spoon gnocchi onto serving plates. Spoon sausage sauce over gnocchi. Top with parmesan and basil. Serve immediately.
